title: Looking for people to play FUN strategies with!
body:
I've been playing League since 2012, and have recently gotten utterly annoyed with the player community. I have a few friends in the waking world who will do crazy stuff with me, but they're rarely on. 

I'm just tired of ranked and tryhard normals. I want to do fun stuff like Rengar + Nami bot, Poppy + Soraka mid, Vayne + Quinn bot; just something that's new and people don't expect! It makes the game so much more fun when not everyone just tries to imitate the LCS players :D

If anyone is interested, just comment and add me in-game :)

replies.body:
FUXK yeah! Riven fiorA bot lane lol. Add me
itachihatake
